item.title: Apache Http Reverse Proxy
item.description: Using Apache HTTP as Reverse Proxy What is a Reverse Proxy A reverse proxy acts as a middle man to all incoming traffic. All incoming traffic first comes to the reverse proxy and from the proxy it is routed to the next component. The below diagram shows the example of a reverse proxy in action The idea behind the above setup is to protect all internal servers from the external world.
